ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 96
ygData.msgSnippet: If all you want to do is check something out that any level 1 shaman barbarian can do, then why haven t you checked it out already ? You ve had plenty of time
ygData.messageBody:
If all you want to do is check something out that any level 1 shaman
barbarian can do, then why haven't you checked it out already ? You've had
plenty of time since you sent your first message, but instead of verifying
your information that is SO important to our group here, you're just sitting
there watching our replies to your original message. Either check it out or
tell us so we can. IF you have any info, that is...

Yours doubtfully,

Morghul, gnome cleric of Bertoxxulous

----- Original Message -----
From: Joshua Bednarz <thewhitemage@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 03, 1999 5:32 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 96


> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
> Why do you all act like this? I try to help, but you decline it. If what
you
> want is for me to truly leave with my information, then that is what I
will
> do. I will leave the choice up to you. I'm trying to apologize by helping,
> but you seem to want to be stubborn, and keep insulting me, saying all I'm
> out here to do is brag, when in fact I'm trying to do the opposite. What I
> have to do could easily be done by a level 1 shaman barbarian. I just want
> to check it out for myself first and return with a report, if you all hate
> me so much that you wouldn't even take direct information from me because
> you think I want to just brag about it, then I wil quietly leave you all
> with out another letter. But like I said, it's yur choice, you can accept
it
> or decline it.
>
